name: Public Restroom Simulator 2022
description:
Public Restroom Simulator 2022 is a first-person-shooter that truly tries to captures the feel of what it feels like to use a public restroom in the current year.

Key features:

  • One-on-one online matches: Paint more area on the map than your opponent to win. You can also temporarily stun your opponents by throwing your projectiles at them.

  • Single-Player mode: Try to survive as long as possible while being shot at by questionable creatures

  • An immersive main menu
